name: Salmon Sandwich Extraordinaire
description: Salmon replaces tuna in this old-fashioned sandwich.
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
4 slices good soft white bread or whole-wheat bread

recipeInstructions.text: Drain salmon, and if it contains skin and bones, remove them (for a more neutral taste, run drained salmon under warm water.) Add egg, relish, celery, mayonnaise, lemon juice and salt and pepper, and mix thoroughly, mashing the salmon while mixing.
Place a lettuce leaf on top of each of two slices of bread. Add tomato, if desired; top with salmon mixture.
